not referring to the date of the fi rst missed period, i.e. the 
date when menstruation was expected to occur the following month and failed to occur. 
Th is mistake will lead to a miscalculation of the gestational age and EDD by about four 
weeks. 
/circle6 If the woman is unable to remember the exact date, encourage her to remember some 
major event, festival or occurrence which she might link with her LMP . A calendar with 
the Indian system of months and local festivals might come in handy
